Squicky here.

Cultural differences.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a86d6f6368725bce00029e#post_55a86d6f6368725bce00029e
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a86c456368725bce000109#post_55a86c456368725bce000109
I was saying Power Rangers doesn't do that, which is good, most countries don't look kindly on depictions of kids involving sexual themes, especially not non con ones like using you magic powers to humiliate a group of children for your own perverse enjoyment,[/bq]
Every time someone complains about Japan a person in Japan simultaneously laughs themselves to death and dies from a raging boner laughing "baka gaijin".

. . . Trust me dude; complaining about Japan culture is a massive lost cause they actively mock westerners.

The way say Japanese companies handle PR mishaps is to laugh at westerners. . . I'm not joking about them mocking westerners either, about half a year ago there was some random drama about a video game and the ceo made a bunch of racial insults to westerners on twitter and he's still the ceo.


Differences between the usa and japan:
In the usa if there's a international drama about a product, "We're sorry for disappointing our customers"
In japan if there's international outrage over a product, "hahahhahahah stupid gaijin!"
